General.Name: Bantas Bandirma Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Bantas Bandirma Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in tin packaging production activities. The company offers cheese cans; oil cans for olive and vegetable oil companies; olive/pickle tin boxes; and thinner/antifreeze/mineral oil cans. It also serves the mineral oil and paint industries. The company exports its products worldwide. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Balikesir, Turkey.

4.Name: Mr. Haydar  Durukan
4.Title: Operation Mang. and Offset & Shipment Mang.
